{{also|南华真人}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=南华真人|type=112}}

===Etymology===
* Literally: true man from the southern lands

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=Nán Huá zhēnrén
|cat=pn
}}

===Proper noun===
{{zh-proper noun}}

# {{lb|zh|archaic}} [[w:Zhuangzi|Zhuangzi]]

===Usage notes===
* After his death, [[w:Zhuangzi|Zhuangzi]] was deified by his followers. They said that he would later travel to the north, and ascend to the heavens as an immortal in a blaze of fire. In the first year of the ''Tianbao'' [[w:Chinese era name|era]] (742), [[w:Emperor Xuanzong of Tang|Emperor Xuanzong of Tang]] gave [[w:Zhuangzi|Zhuangzi]] the appellation ''true man from the southern lands''.
